ODM.Description: Test trial contaning selected CRF forms from CDISC

GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: Selection of CRF forms available at CDISC

Description.TranslatedText: Recurng visit

FormDef.Name: Background Heart Failure Maintenance Medications Part 1

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate whether the listed class/type of background heart failure medication was prescribed to the subject (see the study protocol for details)

FormDef.Name: Background Heart Failure Maintenance Medications Part 2

Description.TranslatedText: List the specific background heart failure medications used. Include all heart failure medications that are to be continued. When a subject has frequent changes in the dose and schedule for oral diuretics, the dosing information can be recorded as PRN

FormDef.Name: Body Sites of Psoriasis Involvement at Baseline

Description.TranslatedText: CRF Instructions: Use one page per affected area

ItemGroupDef.Name: Background Heart Failure Maintenance Medications Part 1
Background Heart Failure Maintenance Medications Part 2
Background Heart Failure Maintenance Medications Part 2 supplement
Body Sites of Psoriasis Involvement at Baseline

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate if the death details are known. If Yes, include the appropriate details where indicated on the CRF

Question.TranslatedText: Were any death detail assessments collected?

Description.TranslatedText: Record the date of collection using this format (DD-MON-YYYY)
Record the date of death
Record the primary cause of death

Question.TranslatedText: What is the primary cause of death?

Description.TranslatedText: Record the secondary cause of death, if applicable

Question.TranslatedText: What is the secondary cause of death?

Description.TranslatedText: Record the physical location where the subject died

Question.TranslatedText: What is the location of death?

Alias.Name: DD.DDTESTCD='LOCDTH', DD.DDTEST='What is the location of death'
DD.DDTEST='What is the location of death'

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate if the death was witnessed, using NY codelist format
Indicate if any ARBs were taken. If Yes, include the appropriate information in Part 2

Question.TranslatedText: Were any angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitors taken?

Alias.Name: CM.CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CM.CMPRESP='Y', CM.CMTRT='ARBs'
CM.CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CM.CMPRESP='Y', CM.CMTRT='ARBs'

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate the reason ACE inhibitors were not prescribed. If the reason is unknown, select "Unknown."

Question.TranslatedText: If No, provide reason for not prescribing ARBs

Alias.Name: CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='ARBs'

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate if any ARNIs were taken. If Yes, include the appropriate information in Part 2

Question.TranslatedText: Were any angiotensin receptor/neprilysin inhibitors (ARNIs) taken?

Alias.Name: CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='ARNIs'
CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='ARNIs'

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate the reason ARNIs were not prescribed. If the reason is unknown, select "Unknown."

Question.TranslatedText: If No, provide reason for not prescribing ARNIs

Alias.Name: CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='ARNIs'

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate if any aldosterone antagonists were taken. If Yes, include the appropriate information in Part 2

Alias.Name: CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='Aldosterone Antagonists'
CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='ARNIs'

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate the reason aldosterone antagonists were not prescribed. If the reason is unknown, select "Unknown."

Question.TranslatedText: If No, provide reason for not prescribing aldosterone antagonists

Alias.Name: CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='Aldosterone Antagonists'

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate if any hydralazine was taken. If Yes, include the appropriate information in Part 2

Alias.Name: CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='Hydralazine'
CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='ARNIs'

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate the reason hydralazine was not prescribed. If the reason is unknown, select "Unknown."

Question.TranslatedText: If No, provide reason for not prescribing hydralazine

Alias.Name: CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='Hydralazine'

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate if any diuretics were taken. If Yes, include the appropriate information in Part 2

Alias.Name: CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='Diuretics'
CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='ARNIs'

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate the reason diuretics were not prescribed. If the reason is unknown, select "Unknown."

Question.TranslatedText: If No, provide reason for not prescribing diuretics

Alias.Name: CMCAT='Heart Failure Maintenance Medication', CMPRESP='Y', CMTRT='Diuretics'

Description.TranslatedText: Record only 1 medication per line. Provide the full trade or proprietary name of the medication; otherwise, the generic name may be recorded
Record the dose of concomitant medication taken per administration (e.g., 200)

Question.TranslatedText: What was the individual dose of the medication per administration?

Description.TranslatedText: Record the dose unit of the dose of concomitant medication taken (e.g., mg)

Question.TranslatedText: What is the unit of the medication per administration?

Description.TranslatedText: Record how often the concomitant medication was taken (e.g., BID, PRN)

Question.TranslatedText: What was the frequency of the medication?

Description.TranslatedText: Provide the route of administration for the concomitant medication

Question.TranslatedText: What was the route of administration of the medication?

Description.TranslatedText: Record the date the concomitant medication was first taken, using this format (DD-MON-YYYY)

Record the concomitant medication as ongoing or not, to indicate whether the subject has stopped taking the concomitant medication at the time of data collection. If the concomitant medication is ongoing, leave the end date blank
Record the date the concomitant medication was stopped, using this format (DD-MON-YYYY). If the subject has not stopped taking the concomitant medication, leave this field blank

ItemDef.Name: Medication given at the recommended regimen

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate if, in the investigator's opinion, the dose regimen was given at the recommended regimen, according to the heart failure standard-of-care guidelines referenced in the protocol

Question.TranslatedText: If applicable, was the medication given at the recommended regimen?

Alias.Name: SUPPCM.QNAM='CMRRGYN', SUPPCM.QLABEL='Was medication given at recom. regimen'

ItemDef.Name: Medication not given at the recommended regimen

Description.TranslatedText: Provide the reason why the recommended dose regimen was not administered at the recommended regimen

Question.TranslatedText: If applicable, why was the medication not given at the recommended regimen?

Alias.Name: SUPPCM.QVAL='CMRRGREA', SUPPCM.QLABEL='Why the medication not given at regimen'

Description.TranslatedText: Record the body location which has plaque psoriasis involvement

Question.TranslatedText: What was the location of psoriasis lesion involvement?

Description.TranslatedText: Specify the laterality of the lesion

Question.TranslatedText: If applicable, what was the laterality of the anatomical location?

Description.TranslatedText: Specify the directionality of the lesion

Question.TranslatedText: If applicable, what was the directionality of the anatomical location?

Description.TranslatedText: Indicate if the subject had any prior psoriasis treatments. If Yes, include the appropriate details where indicated on the CRF

Question.TranslatedText: Has the subject had any psoriasis treatments before the study start?

Description.TranslatedText: Record the treatment subcategory

Question.TranslatedText: What is the subcategory for the treatment?

Description.TranslatedText: Record only 1 treatment per line. Provide the full trade or proprietary name of the; otherwise, the generic name may be recorded

Question.TranslatedText: What was the name of the treatment?

Description.TranslatedText: Record the dose of medication per administration (e.g., 200)

Question.TranslatedText: If the treatment was systemic, what was the individual dose?

Alias.Name: CMCAT='ANTIPSORIATIC', CMDOSE if all values of CMDOSTXT are numeric

Description.TranslatedText: Record the device that was used for drug administration

Question.TranslatedText: If the medication was a biologic, what device was used for drug administration?

Description.TranslatedText: Record the date the treatment was first started using this format (DD-MON-YYYY). If the subject has been taking the medication for a considerable amount of time prior to the start of the study, it is acceptable to have an incomplete date. Prior treatments that are exclusionary should have both a start date and an end date
Record the treatment as ongoing if the subject has not stopped the treatment or medication at the time of data collection; the end date should be left blank

Alias.Name: CMCAT='ANTIPSORIATIC', If Yes, CMENRTPT='ONGOING'. If No, CMENRF=blank

Description.TranslatedText: Record the primary reason the treatment was discontinued

Question.TranslatedText: What was the reason for treatment discontinuation?

Description.TranslatedText: Partial dates are allowed

Alias.Name: DM.BRTHDTC, Partial dates are to be recorded according to ISO 8601

Description.TranslatedText: Sex
Ethnic
Race

Alias.Name: Date and time are to be combined into one variable according to ISO 8601
Date and time are to be combined into one variable according to ISO 8601

Question.TranslatedText: What was the result of the ECG?

Description.TranslatedText: System generated
Adverse event term

Question.TranslatedText: What is the adverse event term?

Description.TranslatedText: System generated

Question.TranslatedText: What is the date the adverse event started?

Alias.Name: Partial dates are stored according to ISO8601

Description.TranslatedText: If the adverse event is NOT ongoing, collect the end date

Question.TranslatedText: Is the adverse event still ongoing?

Alias.Name: If Yes, AE.AEENTPT=ONGOING. If No, AE.AEENTPT=BEFORE

Question.TranslatedText: What is the toxicity grade of the adverse event?

Description.TranslatedText: If Yes, Answer all Seriousness Categories
Tick all that apply
Tick all that apply
Tick all that apply
Tick all that apply
Tick all that apply
Tick all that apply
Tick all that apply
Tick all that apply

Question.TranslatedText: Is this event related to study treatment?

Description.TranslatedText: Sponsor-defined example using a codelist for AERELNST. If more than one AERELNST value is selected, AERELNST is derived to equal ‘MULTIPLE' and individual responses may be mapped to SUPPAE

Question.TranslatedText: What was the outcome of this adverse event?
What action was taken with study treatment?

Description.TranslatedText: This question should be repeated together with the previous section

Question.TranslatedText: Is this event a dose limiting toxicity?

Alias.Name: Partial dates are stored according to ISO8601

Description.TranslatedText: The relative relationship of a timepoint to a reference timepoint
A term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable
The assemblage of physical properties or qualities by which male is distinguished from female; the physical difference between male and female; the distinguishing peculiarity of male or female. (NCI)

A social group characterized by a distinctive social and cultural tradition maintained from generation to generation, a common history and origin and a sense of identification with the group; members of the group have distinctive features in their way of life, shared experiences and often a common genetic heritage; these features may be reflected in their experience of health and disease. (NCI)
Terminology codelist used to identify the race of an individual within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: NATIVE HAWAIIAN OR OTHER PACIFIC ISLANDER

Description.TranslatedText: CDISC terminology for anatomical location or specimen further detailing the side(s) of interest
CDISC terminology for anatomical location or specimen further detailing directionality
A terminology codelist relevant to the course by which a substance is administered in order to reach the site of action in the body
The terminology that includes terms pertaining to frequency within CDISC
Terminology codelist used for anatomical location within CDISC

ItemDef.Name: Does the subject meet all inclusion criteria and none of the exclusion criteria?

Question.TranslatedText: Does the subject meet all inclusion criteria and none of the exclusion criteria?

ItemDef.Name: Inclusion criteria not met tick all that apply

Alias.Name: IE.IETEST=TI.IETEST, IE.IECAT=TI.IECAT. If failed inclusion criteria, IE.IEORRES=N, IE.IESTRESC=N. If failed exclusion criteria, IE.IEORRES=Y, IE.IESTRESC=Y

ItemDef.Name: Exclusion criteria met tick all that apply

Alias.Name: IE.IETEST= TI.IETEST, IE.IECAT=TI.IECAT. If failed inclusion criteria, IE.IEORRES=N, IE.IESTRESC=N. If failed exclusion criteria, IE.IEORRES=Y, IE.IESTRESC=Y

CodeList.Name: No Yes Response Yes No only

Description.TranslatedText: Design note: please update codelist codes as per protocol
